sections.purpose: To describe the procedure for issuing chemicals from the laboratory store.
sections.scope: Applicable to issuing of chemicals to students, faculty, and staff.
procedure: Issue chemicals only against proper authorization.
Verify the chemical name and quantity before issuing.
Record details of issued chemicals in the issue register.
Provide appropriate container for issued chemicals.
Instruct the user on safe handling of the chemical.
sections.precautions: Do not issue chemicals without authorization. Avoid spillage during transfer.
